column3: Well I come from a little bitty,, homegrown small town
column4: Smoky Mountains,, nice place to hang around
column5: Moonshine,, that's where they make it
column6: Put it in a jug,, makes you want to get naked
column7: But I jumped on a greyhound bus one night
column8: And took it all the way to the end of the line
column9: Stepped out in the sun,, when my feet hit the sand
column13: I spent my whole life running around
column14: Still let the wind kind of blow me around
column15: Well I dropped a note in a bottle
column17: And I traded it in for a whole another world
column18: A pirate flag and an island girl
column21: Well my friends back home think I've gone and lost my mind
column22: Take a sip of rum and you really would know why
column23: Jolly Roger flying on the picnic table
column24: Blender in the kitchen,, willing and able
column25: Don't know what makes you say what the hell
column26: But when the salt air catches a hold of that sail
column27: Something about it makes her just want to dance
column33: Well I remember back home beneath the big old moon
column34: Tucked back in the woods,, yeah life was good
column35: But here we are in a local bar and drinking shooting stars
